Items.Title: Oversight - Preserving Affordable Housing in Distress and the Third-Party Transfer Program.
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Preserving Affordable Housing in Distress and the Third-Party Transfer Program.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the third party transfer program, and to repeal sections 11-425, 11-426, and 11-427 of such code, relating to agreements for payment of delinquent taxes and charges in installments
Items.MatterName: Third party transfer program, and to repeal sections 11-425, 11-426, and 11-427 of such code, relating to agreements for payment of delinquent taxes and charges in installments.
